actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to require congressional authorization for the involvement of American Forces in further hostilities in Indochina, and for extending assistance to North Vietnam.

summary.text: Provides that under Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 congressional authorization is required for the involvement of American forces in further hostilities in Indochina, and for the extension of assistance to North Vietnam.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to require congressional authorization for the involvement of American Forces in further hostilities in Indochina, and for extending assistance to North Vietnam.
